quests.name: Finding the Thieves Guild
quests.description: So you want to join the Thieves Guild? Don't you know it doesn't even exist?

quests.name: May the Best Thief Win
quests.description: You want to join, but are you a good enough thief?

quests.name: Independent Thievery
quests.description: Steal as much as you can, and sell it to a Thieves Guild fence.

quests.name: Untaxing the Poor
quests.description: Steal the tax records for the Waterfront residents.

quests.name: The Elven Maiden
quests.description: Steal a statuette for a mystery buyer.

quests.name: Ahdarji's Heirloom
quests.description: Recover a ring stolen by a freelance thief.

quests.name: Misdirection
quests.description: Help the Thieves Guild get the waterfront back to normal.

quests.name: Lost Histories
quests.description: Finish a job from which a guildmate has not returned.

quests.name: Turning a Blind Eye
quests.description: Steal a stone for the Gray Fox.

quests.name: Arrow of Extrication
quests.description: Steal an arrow for the Gray Fox.

quests.name: Boots of Springheel Jak
quests.description: Find out where Springheel Jak is buried and retrieve a pair of magical boots for the Gray Fox.

quests.name: The Ultimate Heist
quests.description: Steal an Elder Scroll for the Gray Fox, and for glory!
